name: UserStyles.org Redesigned 2
description: Based on http://userstyles.org/styles/6403 . All the credit goes to Globex Designs for creating the graphics. I have been waiting to userstyles.org to update their stuff but it seems that might not happen anytime soon. So I decided to revive as much of the old style that I could. Also works with the Autopagerize GM script or AutoPager add-on.
